controller

Class UltrasonicController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.UltrasonicController

  • public class UltrasonicController
extends java.lang.Object
    Provide an abstraction layer for ultrasonic controller to read distances around the robot, in 90 degree segments.
    Author:
    Michael Golfi #260552298, Paul Albert-Lebrun #260507074
